entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Greenstone (Geraldton)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 6:28 PM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -9.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Geraldton Airport 12:00 AM EDT Friday 17 March 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -9.6°C
Pressure: 100.9 kPa
Visibility: 1.6 km
Humidity: 86 %
Wind Chill: -18
Dewpoint: -11.5°C
Wind: NE 22 km/h gust 41 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Blowing snow overnight. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 before morning. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 6:48 PM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Amount 10 to 20 cm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 70. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:48 PM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 70. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 21 in the evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 6:48 PM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local blowing snow. Windy. High minus 6. Forecast issued 6:48 PM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023
